title: Death Valley National Park: Fish
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Nature     Animals     Fish                Fish        Pupfish at Salt Creek are easily viewed during the springtime mating season.    Â       amargosa pupfish Cyprinodon nevadensis amargosa Found in the Amargosa River northwest of Saratoga Springs. saratoga pupfish Cyprinodon nevadensis nevadensis Found at Saratoga Springs at the south end of Death Valley. Devils Hole pupfish Cyprinodon diabolis (endangered species) Found in Devils Hole, 37 miles east of Furnace Creek, in western Nevada. Salt Creek pupfish Cyprinodon salinus salinus Found in Salt Creek in the central part of Death Valley. Cottonball Marsh pupfish Cyprinodon salinus milleri (threatened species) Found in Cottonball Marsh on the west side of central Death Valley. western mosquitofish Gambusia affinis (invasive species) Introduced into Furnace Creek irrigation ditches and ponds.
